ComicInfo.Summary:
The Werewolf of the Alps: A werewolf falls in love with a girl, kills her husband then finds out she is a werelion.
Absent-Minded Professor: A young woman marries an absent-minded professor only to find out he has an artificial hand, an artificial foot, an artificial ear...
The Bone Man: A paleontologist who is obsessed with bones is betrayed and goes crazy, killing people.
You Can't Keep a Good King Down: A prince murders his brother so he will be king, but the corpse keeps returning to thwart his plans.
ComicInfo.Title: The Werewolf of the Alps; Absent-Minded Professor; The Bone Man; You Can't Keep a Good King Down
